mapper.select: select w.id, w.keyword, w.contents, w.img_url, w.detail_url, w.classification from wiki w where w.keyword like #{keyword} limit 500
select w.id, w.keyword, w.contents, w.img_url, w.detail_url, w.classification from wiki w where w.keyword like #{keyword} and w.category=#{category} limit 500
select w.id, w.keyword, w.contents, w.img_url, w.detail_url, w.classification from wiki w where match (w.keyword) against (#{keyword} in natural language mode) limit 500
select w.id, w.keyword, w.contents, w.img_url, w.detail_url, w.classification from wiki w where match (w.keyword) against (#{keyword} in natural language mode) and w.category = #{category} limit 500
